price: Uretse ku bw’impuhwe ziduturutseho, n’ibyishimo by’igihe gito.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَمَتَٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan minnā wamatāʿan ilā ḥīnin
